ygData.subject: Re: Similar Problem
ygData.msgSnippet: That quest is involving the Drunkard that wonders around Kelethin, to complete that quest you will need to be about lvl 11-15 and still will want to have
ygData.messageBody:
That quest is involving the Drunkard that wonders around Kelethin, to
complete that quest you will need to be about lvl 11-15 and still will want
to have friends with you. I would recomend talking to the paladins in the
back room, get in a group and try to get a Oracle scroll for a quest from
one of them at your lvl, maybe more suited for a 6th or 7th.

Laurana Highwind
High Elf Paladin
15th rank Knight of Tunare
The Rathe
